translation.en: You had rations for two weeks.
You were inside for nearly four months.
How long did you think you were inside?

translation.es: ¿Y qué es lo que sí sabe?

translation.en: Like all cells, it is born from an existing cell.
translation.es: Como todas, nace de otra célula existente.

translation.en: all cells were ultimately born from one cell.
A single organism alone on planet Earth,
translation.es: Un único organismo en la Tierra,
Cuatro mil millones de años atrás,

translation.en: one became two, two became four.
translation.es: una se dividió en dos, dos en cuatro.

translation.en: The rhythm of the dividing pair...
translation.es: El ritmo del par de división...

translation.en: which becomes the structure of every microbe,
translation.es: ...que se vuelve la estructurade cada microbio,

translation.en: blade of grass, sea creature, land creature...
translation.es: brizna de césped,criatura marina y terrestre...

translation.en: The structure of everything that lives...
translation.es: La estructura de todo lo que tiene vida...

translation.en: As students of medicine, as the doctors of tomorrow,
translation.es: Como estudiantes de medicina,los médicos del futuro,

translation.en: this is where you come in.
The cell we're looking at is from a tumor.
translation.es: La célula que estamos viendoes de un tumor.

translation.en: Female patient, early 30s, taken from the cervix.
translation.es: Es del cérvix de una pacientede unos 30 años.

translation.en: Over the course of the next term,
we will be closely examining cancer cells in vitro
translation.es: examinaremos en detallecélulas tumorales in vitro

translation.en: [Katie] I read the John Sulston paper last night.
translation.es: Ya leí el ensayo de John Sulston.

translation.en: I still feel like I'm not working hard enough.
-They find everything easier. -[woman] You aren't, and they don't.
translation.es: - Los otros comprenden todo.- No es así.

translation.en: [Dan] I've been looking for you at lunch, but you never seem to be around.
translation.es: Te busqué en el almuerzo,pero ya no te veo.

translation.en: I've been catching up on some writing.
All work and no play, it sounds... not healthy.
translation.es: No es sano estar tan ocupado.
si tenías planes para el sábado.

translation.en: Sarah and I have a few people over.
translation.es: Sarah y yo haremos fiesta en el jardín.

translation.en: A garden party while the weather holds.
translation.es: Hay que aprovechar el buen clima.

translation.en: Thanks, Dan, I really appreciate it, but I'm going to paint our bedr--
translation.es: Gracias, Dan, pero voy a pintarnuestra alcoba...

translation.en: You're allowed to come to a barbecue. It is not a betrayal
translation.es: Puedes ir a una barbacoa. No traicionas ni insultas su recuerdo.

translation.en: or an insult to his memory.
translation.es: No traicionas ni insultas su recuerdo.

translation.en: -♪ Confusion has its cost ♪ -Oh, my God. Oh, my God!
-♪ Who lingers ♪ -Oh, my God. I thought you were gone. ♪ Saying she is lost ♪
No one knew anything about your unit.
translation.es: Nadie sabía nada de tu unidad.

translation.en: The other partners knew just as little as me.
translation.es: Las otras parejas sabíanlo mismo que yo.

translation.en: Okay, yeah, it was covert. Yeah, I think so.
I-- I don't know where it was, or...
How is that possible? [stammers] Was it warm?
Did the people there speak Portuguese, or Swahili, or Pashto?
How long have you been back?
How'd you get back? What base did you fly into?
-I don't know. -Your unit, did they come back with you?
translation.es: No lo sé. ¿El resto de la unidadvolvió contigo?

translation.en: You must be able to tell me something.
You vanished off the face of the earth for 12 months.
translation.es: Desapareciste de la Tierra por un año.

translation.en: I deserve a better explanation than no explanation.
No, I was outside the room.
Stay with me, baby. -[coughing] -I'm right here with you.
Stay with me, baby. I love you.
Baby, look at me. Can you do something?!
[paramedic] You call for a police escort?
[man] Out of the truck, now! -[men shouting] -[Lena] What are you doing?
[paramedic] What are you doing? You can't move him!
Let him go! Let him go!
It's a hangover from the sedative you were given.
translation.es: Es la resaca del sedante que le dieron.

translation.en: Why am I talking to a psychologist?
Am I in a psychiatric hospital?
You served in the military for seven years.
translation.es: Estuvo siete años en el ejército.

translation.en: I'm a professor from Johns Hopkins.
I want to know what the fuck I'm doing here.
translation.es: Quiero saber qué mierda hago aquí.

translation.en: Your research area is the genetically programmed life cycle of a cell.
translation.es: Usted investiga el ciclo celulargenéticamente programado.

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like to talk about Sergeant Kane.
When did he arrive back home?
-I want to see a lawyer. -You're not gonna be able to.
translation.es: - Quiero ver a un abogado.- No podrá hacerlo.

translation.en: Did he explain how he got back?
-No. -Did he contact you at any point
[Ventress] What did he tell you about his mission when he returned?
translation.es: ¿Qué le contó de la misión al regresar?

translation.en: Did he ever mention where he was going, what he was doing?
translation.es: ¿Alguna vez dijo adónde iríao qué haría?

translation.en: He never said, I never asked.
translation.es: No dijo nada y yo no pregunté.

translation.en: But you made regular requests for information from his unit CO.
translation.es: Pero le pidió información a su comandanteen varias oportunidades.

translation.en: Until six months ago, and then you stopped.
translation.es: Hasta hace seis meses,luego no preguntó más.

translation.en: Why was that? Thought he was dead?
It's not easy to move on.
I'm done answering questions. It's your turn.
translation.es: Me cansé de responder.Ahora le toca a usted.

translation.en: He must have been exposed to some sort of radiation,
translation.es: Debe haber estado expuestoa algún tipo de radiación,

translation.en: You have to tell me where he was, what he was doing.
translation.es: Debe decirme dónde estuvo, qué hizo.

translation.en: It started around three years ago.
translation.es: Comenzó hace alrededor de tres años.

translation.en: Blackwater National Park reported that a lighthouse was surrounded
translation.es: El parque nacional Blackwater informóque había un faro rodeado

translation.en: One of the wardens went in to investigate.
translation.es: Uno de los guardabosques fue a investigar.

translation.en: Since then, we've approached by land, by sea,
translation.es: Desde entonces,hemos ido por tierra, por mar,

translation.en: sent in drones, animals, and teams of people.
translation.es: hemos enviado drones, animalesy equipos de personas.

translation.en: And the boundary's getting bigger. It's expanding.
translation.es: Y el límite se va agrandando,se va expandiendo.

translation.en: So far, it's eating into barely populated swampland,
translation.es: Hasta ahora llega a un pantano desolado,

translation.en: which, you know, we evacuated under the pretext of a chemical spill,
translation.es: el cual evacuamosbajo pretexto de un derrame químico,

translation.en: but... that won't last much longer.
translation.es: pero eso no durará mucho más.

translation.en: In a few months, the area will have grown to where we are right now.
translation.es: En unos meses, el área habrá crecidohasta donde estamos ahora.

translation.en: We need to come to an agreement about what to do with you.
translation.es: Debemos definir qué haremos con usted.

translation.en: You're not going to let me go home?
Is that what you want? To go home?
I want to be with him.
I was just looking at the moon.
It's always so weird seeing it like that in the daylight.
translation.es: Siempre es raro verla de día.
Como si fuera un error de Dios.

translation.en: somewhat key to the whole "being a god" thing.
translation.es: Es el punto de que sea algo de Dios.

translation.en: You know he's listening right now, don't you?
circumvent the Hayflick limit, you can prevent senescence.
translation.es: y eludes el límite de Hayflick,previenes la vejez.

translation.en: I was about to make the exact same point.
translation.es: Iba a decir exactamente lo mismo.

translation.en: It means the cell doesn't grow old, it becomes immortal.
translation.es: La célula no envejece,se vuelve inmortal.

translation.en: They say aging is a natural process, but it's actually a fault in our genes.
translation.es: Vemos la vejez como algo natural,pero es una falla genética.

translation.en: I get really turned on when you patronize me. It's really hot.
translation.es: Me excita que me subestimes.Es muy sensual.

translation.en: Without it, I could keep looking like this forever.
translation.es: Sin eso, me vería así por siempre.

translation.en: Oh, okay. -Well, that could constitute a mistake. -[laughs]
translation.es: Bueno, eso podría considerarse un error.

translation.en: You didn't tell me where you're heading this time.
translation.es: No me dijiste adónde vas esta vez.

translation.en: I know there's something strange about this mission.
translation.es: Hay algo raro en esta misión.

translation.en: The silence around it is louder than usual.
Kind of angling for a clue here.
We'll be under the same hemisphere.
It tells you that if you step outside and you look up...
translation.es: Significa que si miras al cielo...

translation.en: we'll be looking at the same stars.
You think that's what I do while you're away?
-What? -You think I'm out in the garden,
pining, looking up at the sky?
translation.es: y te extraño mientras miro el cielo?

translation.en: -[scoffs] Shut up. All right. -Oh, to think my beloved Kane...
translation.es: - Cállate, ¿sí?- Solo pensar - que mi amado Kane...- Bien.

translation.en: -Okay. Uh-huh. -...is looking at the selfsame moon.
translation.es: - que mi amado Kane...- Bien. ...está viendo la misma Luna.

translation.en: Jesus. You know what? You are disrespectful,
seriously, not only to your former comrades in the armed forces,
-but also to the president. -You forgot the flag.
translation.es: - y con el presidente.- Y la bandera.

translation.en: Oh, I'm getting-- I'm getting to the motherfucking flag.
translation.es: Ya iba a mencionar la maldita bandera.

translation.en: [woman] She's all by herself. Don't you think we should make friends?
-[woman 2] Well, obviously you should. -[woman] Yep, I'll do it.
You know, I always see you here alone. It's...
I'm guessing you probably feel weird or awkward.

translation.es: No te sientas mal, en serio.

translation.en: The people here put themselves to sleep in the fetal position
translation.es: La gente aquí se duermeen posición fetal

translation.en: Um, why don't you come and meet my crew?
translation.es: Ven a conocer a mis amigas.

translation.en: [Lena and woman] Hi nice to meet you.
Yeah, that's Cassie Sheppard, and Josie Radek.
translation.es: Ellas son Cassie Sheppardy Josie Radek.

translation.en: -[Cassie] Do you want to have a seat? -Thank you.
-So, first day at the Southern Reach. -Yes.
translation.es: - Primer día en Southern Reach.- Sí.

translation.en: Um, yeah, right from the start.
I've been testing the magnetic fields around the boundary,
translation.es: He examinado los campos magnéticosen el límite,

translation.en: which is like using confetti to test a hurricane.
translation.es: que es como usar confetipara analizar un huracán.

translation.en: Uh, and I've been here... ten months.
translation.es: Hace diez meses que estoy aquí.

translation.en: Tried to join an NGO, but my application got flagged,
translation.es: Intenté unirme a una ONG,vieron mi solicitud,

translation.en: Only two months. I'm a physicist.
translation.es: Solo dos meses. Soy física. Recién terminémi posdoctorado en Cambridge.

translation.en: I came straight from my Cambridge postdoc.
translation.es: Soy física. Recién terminémi posdoctorado en Cambridge.

translation.en: Uh, I'm from Johns Hopkins, biologist.
We had a bet on your profession, and Josie had biologist, of course.
translation.es: Apostamos por tu profesión,y Josie dijo "bióloga".

translation.en: -I had law enforcement. -I had you as single.
Jesus. Do you have to hit on everyone, like all the time?
I think I'm allowed to roll the dice a few more times. [chuckles]
Well, yeah, um, crazy as it seems...
-You're going into the Shimmer? -Six days and counting.

translation.es: ¿La doctora Ventress? La líder del equipo.

translation.en: The previous teams have been largely military, so, yeah.
translation.es: Los equipos anterioresen su mayoría militares... Sí.

translation.en: What do you think happened to them?
Well, there are two theories of what went wrong in the Shimmer.
translation.es: Hay dos teoríassobre lo que pasó en el Resplandor.

translation.en: Two, they go crazy and kill each other.
translation.es: Dos: enloquecierony se mataron entre ellos.

translation.en: [Josie] There was one military guy who made it out.
Yeah, but you heard about the state that he was in.
I know why you went in.
And I know what I have to do.
translation.es: Y sé lo que tengo que hacer.

translation.en: [Ventress] So you didn't tell them about your connection to Sergeant Kane?
translation.es: ¿No les habló de su relacióncon el sargento Kane?

translation.en: [Lena] I thought it would complicate things.
Why are you going into the Shimmer?
The mission statement is to reach the supposed source of the Shimmer,
translation.es: El objetivo de la misión es llegar al supuesto origen del Resplandor,el faro,

translation.en: the lighthouse, enter and acquire data, and return.
translation.es: al supuesto origen del Resplandor,el faro, ingresar, recoger información, y regresar.

translation.en: But I don't think that that's your mission statement.
translation.es: Pero no creo que ese sea su objetivo.

translation.en: I've been watching the phenomenon for a while now.
translation.es: Hace tiempo que observo este fenómeno.
Yo hago el perfil de los voluntarios.

translation.en: There's only so long one can do that.
translation.es: Hay un tiempo limitado para hacerlo.

translation.en: But you need to know what's inside?
You want to come with us.
I can't do anything for him here.
You requested to join the mission.
translation.es: Usted pidió unirse a la misión.

translation.en: You knew all other missions had failed
translation.es: Sabía del fracaso de las otras misiones

translation.en: and the only survivor was barely surviving.
translation.es: y del estado crítico del sobreviviente.

translation.en: I'm only trying to understand what drove you.
[Anya] And then we get some real meals.

translation.es: Espagueti. Galletas de verduras para Radek.

translation.en: Wow, cornbread. That's not so bad.
translation.es: Vaya, pan de maíz. Nada mal.

translation.en: You gotta give me a second. I'm a little disoriented.
You don't remember setting up camp, do you?
I don't remember anything... after we reached the tree line.
translation.es: No recuerdo nadadespués de la línea de árboles.

translation.en: And we did a food inventory.
From the depletion, we've been out here for at least three or four days.
translation.es: y por la escasez,parece que llegamos hace tres o cuatro días.

translation.en: Guys, I've been checking my comms and nav equipment.
translation.es: Revisé mis equipos de comunicacióny de navegación.

translation.en: They boot up fine, no problem with the electronics,
translation.es: Encienden bien,no hay problemas de electrónica,

translation.en: but anything that sends a signal out of the Shimmer... is down.
translation.es: pero lo que envía señalesfuera del Resplandor no funciona.

translation.en: Even though we've probably got about 20 satellites above us right now,
translation.es: A pesar de tener unos 20 satélites encima,

translation.en: So we've got no compass, no comms, no coordinates...
Well, we know we're in the state park.
We head south, we hit the ocean,
then we can just follow the shoreline until we hit the perimeter wall. Right?
translation.es: luego seguimos la costahasta el muro perimetral, ¿no?

translation.en: -How do we know what's south? -Come on, Josie, you know this.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo vamos al sur?- Vamos, lo sabes.
La manecilla de la hora al Sol.

translation.en: Split the difference between the hour hand and 12, south.
translation.es: Divide la diferenciaentre la manecilla y las 12, sur.

translation.en: We weren't really expecting the comms equipment to work, were we?
There's been three years of expeditions and three years of radio silence.
translation.es: Ha habido expediciones por tres años, y hace tres años que hay silencio.

translation.en: Let's pack up and get moving.
We've already lost a lot of the day.
[Anya] Oh, I'm gonna check this out. Get us out of this damn swamp.
[Ventress] All right. Let's check out the hut.
Looks like someone's about to have a wedding.
translation.es: Parece que alguien va a casarse.

translation.en: To look at them, you wouldn't say that they're the same species.
translation.es: A simple vista, no parecende la misma especie.

translation.en: But they're growing from the same branch structure...
translation.es: Pero crecen de la misma rama...

translation.en: so it has to be the same species.
It's like they're stuck in a continuous mutation.
you'd sure as hell call it a pathology if you saw this in a human.
translation.es: Sin duda sería una patologíasi fuera en un humano.

translation.en: No. It's been long abandoned, maybe even before--
translation.es: No. Está abandonada hace mucho,tal vez desde antes...

translation.en: -[Lena] Help me with her! -[Anya] What's going on?
[Anya] Let's sit you down. Help me with her bag.
translation.es: Vamos a sentarte. Toma su mochila.

translation.en: Okay, just breathe. It's okay. You're just fine.
-What the hell happened? -Something in the water.
translation.es: - ¿Qué diablos pasó?- Algo en el agua.

translation.en: It's exactly the same as the flowers.
Something here is making giant waves in the gene pool.
translation.es: Algo está afectando el fondo genético.

translation.en: Sharks have teeth like that, don't they?
Do you think it's a crossbreed?
You can't crossbreed between different species.
translation.es: No se pueden cruzardos especies distintas.

translation.en: The mutations were subtle at first.
translation.es: Las mutaciones era sutiles al comienzo.

translation.en: More extreme as we grew closer to the lighthouse.
translation.es: Más extremas a medidaque nos acercábamos al faro.

translation.en: Is it possible these were hallucinations?
But they were shared among all of us.
[clicks tongue] Must have gotten that from the gator.
translation.es: Debe haber sido por el cocodrilo.

translation.en: So, where'd you learn to shoot?
I was in the military before I was an academic.
translation.es: Fui militar antes de ser profesora.

translation.en: Feels like a lifetime ago now.
translation.es: Siento que fue en otra vida.

translation.en: All other lives feel like a lifetime ago.
translation.es: Todas las vidas se sientencomo otra vida.

translation.en: We were kids, I was married.
Which do you carry around your neck? A husband or a child?
translation.es: ¿Qué llevas en el cuello?¿Un esposo o un hijo?

translation.en: He was in the army, too. That's...
Guess there had to be something.

translation.es: Para que te ofrecieras a venir.

translation.en: It's not exactly something you do if your life is in... perfect harmony.
translation.es: No es algo que hacessi tu vida está en armonía.

translation.en: 'cause she doesn't want you to see the scars on her forearms.
translation.es: para no mostrarlas cicatrices en los brazos.

translation.en: No, I think the opposite, trying to feel alive.
translation.es: Creo que lo contrario.Intentaba sentirse viva.

translation.en: Yeah. As far as anyone knows...
no friends, no family, no partner, no children.
No concession in her at all.
In a way, it's two bereavements.
translation.es: En cierto modo, fueron dos pérdidas.

translation.en: and the person I once was.
This used to be the headquarters of the Southern Reach.
translation.es: Este era el cuartel generalde Southern Reach.
Antes de que el Resplandor lo tragara.

translation.en: Is that the old mess hall?
There's beds and bags. You think people are here?
translation.es: Hay camas y mochilas.¿Creen que haya gente?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna go with the past tense.
This shit is heavy. Can't carry this.
translation.es: Esta mierda es pesada.No puedo cargarla.

translation.en: Lena, what you got going on?
Those were the soldiers on the last expedition.
translation.es: Los soldados de la última expedición.

translation.en: Looks like they were using this room as their base of operations.
translation.es: Usaron la salacomo base de operaciones.

translation.en: Why are some of the names crossed out?
-This is a plan view of the base, right? -[Cassie] Yep. This is the mess hall.
translation.es: - Este es un plano de la base, ¿no?- Sí. Este es el comedor.

translation.en: I think that the times by the names are a guard rota, so...
translation.es: Creo que la hora indica una rotación de vigilancia.

translation.en: if they were guarding the perimeter, we should.
This might be able to tell us something.

translation.es: Creo que se refiere a nosotras.

translation.en: I should be able to play this.
Okay, so we know what happened to the last group. They went insane.

translation.es: Había algo vivo dentro de él.

translation.en: -That was a trick of the light. -[Cassie] What?
[Anya] I've been a paramedic for 10 years. I've scraped people off the road.
translation.es: Llevo diez años de paramédica. Despegué gente del asfalto.

translation.en: You see some weird shit. That was a trick of the light.
translation.es: Ves cosas muy raras.Eso fue una ilusión óptica.

translation.en: -[Josie] His insides were moving. -[Anya] No, it was shock.
translation.es: - Sus entrañas se movían.- Fue un reflejo, Radek.

translation.en: -That was a shock response. -[Cassie] Watch it again.
translation.es: - Fue un reflejo.- Míralo de nuevo.

translation.en: [Anya] No, I'm not gonna watch it again!
[Cassie] That was not intestines. It was a worm-- [Anya] Okay, then you watch it, Sheppard!
translation.es: - No eran intestinos. Parecía un gusano...- ¡Míralo tú, Sheppard!

translation.en: -I don't want to stay here tonight. -We don't have a choice.
translation.es: - No quiero dormir aquí.- No hay elección.

translation.en: It's too late in the day for us to move on.
I gotta leave a day early.
But we had a whole day planned.
-We were gonna drive to the country-- -No, we can't.
It's good Josie's getting some rest.
With the help of a little sedative.
translation.es: Con la ayuda de un sedante.

translation.en: How about you? Get some sleep?
I'm at least as freaked as Josie.
What're you doing up? Not supposed to relieve me until 3:00.
translation.es: ¿Qué haces despierta?Me relevas a las tres.

translation.en: I'm done sleeping for the night.
Okay, this is where we are...
It's a small community we evacuated two years ago.
translation.es: Una pequeña comunidadque evacuamos hace dos años.

translation.en: I think we should head there tomorrow,
and then head out for the coast the following morning.
translation.es: y salir para la costa la mañana siguiente.

translation.en: you didn't tell the team about your connection to Kane,
translation.es: ...que no hablarde tu relación con Kane

translation.en: I wasn't sure if that was a good idea.

translation.es: Pero luego de ver el video...

translation.en: I'm not sure how they would have reacted to you.
Why did my husband volunteer for a suicide mission?
translation.es: ¿Por qué mi esposo fueen una misión suicida?

translation.en: Is that what you think we're doing?
So you're asking me as a psychologist.
I'd say you're confusing suicide with self-destruction.
Almost none of us commit suicide...
and almost all of us self-destruct.
In some way, in some part of our lives.
translation.es: De algún modo, en algún aspecto.

translation.en: In fact, you're probably better equipped to explain this than I am. -What does that mean? -[scoffs]
translation.es: - Puedes explicarlo mejor que yo.- ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Wake up, Josie, come on. Wake up. Something's happening.
[Cassie] What happened? I heard a noise.
-Through the fence? -It's ripped open like a fucking zipper.
translation.es: - ¿La reja?- Está abierta como un cierre.

translation.en: Sheppard was next to me. Something took her.
-[Cassie continues screaming] -Oh, fuck! Oh, fuck! Sheppard!
-We have to go back now. -[Anya] She's right.
-[sighs] -[Anya] We lost one of our own.
We have evidence the previous team went nuts and chopped each other up.
translation.es: El video muestraque enloquecieron y se mataron.

translation.en: I really don't know how much more right she has to be.
translation.es: No sé qué otro motivo hace falta.

translation.en: We still don't understand the cause or the nature of the Shimmer.
translation.es: Todavía no conocemosqué causa el Resplandor.

translation.en: We have data, observations, photographs. She has hella footage.
translation.es: Tenemos información, fotografías.Ella tiene un video.

translation.en: All of which makes the phenomenon less explicable, not more.
translation.es: Todo hace que el fenómenosea menos explicable, no más.

translation.en: I'm gonna get to the lighthouse,
and I'm fine going on my own.
You just need to decide... whether you're coming with me or not.
translation.es: Ustedes decidan si vienen o no.

translation.en: It's like she hasn't noticed that Sheppard is dead.
translation.es: Parece que no notaraque Sheppard murió.

translation.en: You know, and thanks for the fucking backup, Lena.
translation.es: Gracias por el puto apoyo, Lena.

translation.en: -I didn't realize there were sides. -[Anya] Yeah.
translation.es: - No sabía que había bandos.- Sí.

translation.en: Okay, then I agree with you. We should go back.
Good. Okay, great. There we go. Okay?
-So the three of us can-- -[Lena] Hold on a minute.
But it took us, what, six days to get here?
translation.es: Pero tardamos seis días en llegar aquí.

translation.en: And the coast is two days away.
translation.es: Y la costa está a dos días.

translation.en: when we get to the coast, we can follow it until the perimeter wall.
translation.es: ...cuando lleguemos a la costa, seguiremos hasta llegar al muro.

translation.en: You're saying we get out by going deeper?
This isn't some bullshit tactic to get us to the lighthouse, is it?
translation.es: Es una táctica de mierdapara llevarnos al faro.

translation.en: This is not about the lighthouse, okay?
I believe that the coast is the best route out.
translation.es: Creo que la costa es la mejor salida.

translation.en: I didn't know what going back meant.
Why it would be safer than going forward.
translation.es: Por qué sería más seguroque seguir avanzando.

translation.en: [man] You didn't know, but you made a decision to continue as if you did.
translation.es: No lo sabía, pero decidió continuarcomo si lo hubiese sabido.

translation.en: [man] Ventress had cancer. She was never coming back.
translation.es: Ventress tenía cáncer,no iba a regresar.

translation.en: Fine. Just... leave me the fuck alone.
It's another two hours' walk up the coast.
translation.es: Son dos horas de caminatahasta la costa.

translation.en: At first I thought the radio waves were blocked by the Shimmer,
translation.es: Creía que el Resplandorbloqueaba las ondas de radio,

translation.en: and that's why no one inside could communicate with base or GPS,
translation.es: por eso nadie podía comunicarsecon la base,

translation.en: but the light waves aren't blocked, they're refracted, and...
translation.es: pero las ondas de luz no son bloqueadas,son refractadas.
Lo mismo con las ondas de radio.

translation.en: know what you'd get if you sequenced it?
Hox? What is-- What's Hox mean?
They're the genes that define the body plan, the physical structure.
translation.es: Son los genes que definenel cuerpo, la estructura física.

translation.en: And the plants have human body plan.
translation.es: Las plantas tienen forma de cuerpo humano.

translation.en: Arms attached to shoulders. Legs to hips.
translation.es: Brazos que salen de los hombros. Caderas y piernas.

translation.en: The Shimmer is a prism, but it refracts everything.
translation.es: El Resplandor es un prisma,pero refracta todo.

translation.en: Not just light and radio waves.
translation.es: No solo ondas de radio y de luz.

translation.en: All right... I guess this is a bedroom.
translation.es: Creo que esta es la alcoba.

translation.en: You spend more time away from your husband than with him.
translation.es: Pasas más tiempoalejada de tu esposo que con él.

translation.en: You can't talk to him about work, and he won't talk to you about his.
translation.es: Ni tú le hablas de tu trabajo,ni él del suyo.

translation.en: And there is a clear physical and intellectual connection between us.
translation.es: Y entre nosotros hay una evidenteconexión física e intelectual.

translation.en: -Have I covered the bases? -You forgot your wife.
translation.es: ¿Mencioné todo? - Olvidaste a tu esposa.- Amo a mi esposa.
- Olvidaste a tu esposa.- Amo a mi esposa.

translation.en: You think that something may have happened to him?
You think somehow he's found out about our affair.
translation.es: Crees que de algún modosupo de lo nuestro.

translation.en: I'm not interested in talking... or in anything you have to say.
translation.es: No quiero hablarni oír lo que tengas para decir.

translation.en: Just get dressed and get out.
You know, it's not me you hate, it's yourself.
translation.es: No es a mí a quien odias,sino a ti misma.

translation.en: You don't get to ask that fucking question. You answer it!
-[Anya] Why didn't you tell us? -[speaks indistinctly]
There are two theories of what went wrong.
translation.es: Hay dos teorías sobre lo que ocurrió.

translation.en: One is that something in here killed them.
translation.es: Una es que algo aquí los mató.

translation.en: Two... is that they went crazy and they killed each other.
translation.es: La otra es que enloquecierony se mataron entre ellos.

translation.en: Josie nearly got killed by an alligator,
translation.es: A Josie casi la mata un cocodrilo,

translation.en: and Cass did get killed by a bear. [voice breaks]
translation.es: y a Cass la mató un oso.

translation.en: So, yes, theory one, it fits.
I didn't actually see a bear.
[Anya] The only people who saw were Lena and Ventress.
translation.es: Solo Lena y Ventress vieron al oso.

translation.en: So nothing's confirmed. Everything's on their word.
translation.es: No podemos confirmar nada. Hay que creerles,creer en lo que dice Lena.
Hay que creerles,creer en lo que dice Lena.

translation.en: is that Lena... is a liar.
Or do you think I've lost my shit and we're gonna fuck each other up?
translation.es: ¿O crees que yo estoy locay nos vamos a matar entre todas?

translation.en: When I look at my hands...
and you tie me to a chair and cut me open...
translation.es: y me atan a la silla y me abren...

translation.en: are my insides gonna move like my fingerprints?
But... I'm not the one tied to a chair.
-You said she was dead. -[Lena speaks indistinctly]
[in Cassie's voice] Help me! Help me!
-It's not even light yet. -I don't have time to wait.
translation.es: - Aún no amanece.- No hay tiempo.

translation.en: Our bodies as fast as our minds. Can't you feel it?
translation.es: En cuerpo y mente a la vez.¿Lo sientes?

translation.en: It's like the onset of dementia.
translation.es: Es como la aparición de la demencia.

translation.en: If I don't reach the lighthouse soon...
translation.es: Si no llego pronto al faro...

translation.en: the person that started this journey won't be the person that ends it.
translation.es: ...la persona que comenzóno será la misma que termine.

translation.en: I want to be the one that ends it.
translation.es: Y quiero ser yo quien termine.

translation.en: How long was your husband in the Shimmer?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tiempo estuvo tu esposoen el Resplandor?

translation.en: Theoretically, as long as a year.
That's a long time to be inside and remain intact.
translation.es: Es mucho tiempo para quedar intacto.

translation.en: I'm not so sure he was intact.
translation.es: No creo que haya quedado intacto.

translation.en: I checked my blood last night.
It will be in all of us.
Sheppard's voice in the mouth of that creature last night.
translation.es: ...la voz de Sheppardsaliendo de esa criatura.

translation.en: I think as she was dying, part of her mind became...
translation.es: Creo que, mientras moría,parte de su mente se volvió...

translation.en: part of the creature that was killing her.
translation.es: ...parte de la criatura que la mató.

translation.en: Imagine dying frightened and in pain,
translation.es: Imagina estar muriendo,con miedo y dolor,

translation.en: and having that as the only part of you which survives.
translation.es: y que solo esa parte de ti sobreviva.

translation.en: I wouldn't like that at all.
But I don't think I want either of those things.
translation.es: Pero yo no quiero nada de eso.

translation.en: One by one, all gone, except you.
Is it something I need to explain?
I'm not sure any of them did.
♪ You'll see something certain To tell you ♪
translation.es: EL FARO LA VIDA INMORTAL DE HENRIETTA LACKS

translation.en: I thought I was a man.
And now I'm not so sure.
If I wasn't Kane, what was I?
translation.es: Si yo no era Kane, ¿quién era?

translation.en: You ever seen a phosphorus grenade go off? They're kind of bright.
translation.es: ¿Viste explotaruna granada de fósforo blanco? Son luminosas.

translation.en: If you ever get out of here, you find Lena.
translation.es: Si logras salir de aquí, busca a Lena.

translation.en: That I needed to know what was inside the lighthouse.
translation.es: Que yo necesitaba saberqué había en el faro.

translation.en: I don't know what it wants.
will be fragmented into their smallest parts until...
translation.es: todo será reducido a pequeños fragmentos hasta que no quede nada.

translation.en: I don't think it wanted anything.
I'm not sure it even knew I was there.
translation.es: No sé si sabía que yo estaba ahí.

translation.en: It came here for a reason.
It was mutating our environment, it was destroying everything.
A team reached the lighthouse a few hours ago.
translation.es: Un equipo llegó al faro hace unas horas.

translation.en: If what you encountered was once alive...
translation.es: Si lo que vio estaba vivo...

translation.en: Now will you tell me what happened to my husband?
translation.es: ¿Quiere decirme qué le pasó a mi esposo?

translation.en: his blood pressure stabilized and his pulse rate started to rise.
translation.es: su presión sanguínea se estabilizóy el pulso aumentó.

translation.en: A few hours later, he was not only awake,
